revised_title: Asymptotic Approximation for High-Frequency Unsteady Cascade Flow
tldr: The authors present a new uniformly valid asymptotic factorization for the scattering of harmonic gusts by a two-dimensional infinite cascade of flat plates, relevant to predicting noise generation by rotating turbomachinery. This new approximation improves upon previous methods by being accurate across a wide range of operating parameters, even near cut-off conditions. The accuracy of the new approximation is demonstrated by comparing it with exact results, showing typical errors of only 3% even for modest values of reduced frequency.
